softwarerequirements: Windows: XP (SP3), Vista, 7 Mac: OS X 10.4 or later
burstrate: Up to 1 fps for up to 6 frames
fileformats: Still Images: DNG,           JPEG Movies: MPEG-4           AVC/H.264
whitebalancemodes: Auto, Cloudy, Daylight, Flash, Fluorescent,           Fluorescent (Day White), Fluorescent (Natural           White), Fluorescent (White), Manual, Shade,           Tungsten
lens: 11 elements in 8 groups 4 Aspheric EFL: 6-24 mm (35 mm equivalent: 28-112 mm) Aperture: f/1.8 (W) - 2.5 (T) to f/8
focusrange: Manual: 0.4" (10.16 mm) - Infinity Wide: 1.3' (0.40 m) - Infinity Telephoto: 5.2' (1.58 m) - Infinity Wide Macro: 2" (5.08 cm) - 19.7" (50.04 cm) Tele Macro: 8" (20.32 cm) - 19.7" (50.04 cm)
exposuremodes: Modes: Aperture Priority, Auto, Manual,           Programmed Auto, Shutter Priority Compensation: -2 EV to +2 EV (in 0.3 EV steps)
zoom: Optical: 4x Digital: 1.95x Intelligent Zoom: 5.2x Intelligent Zoom: 7.8x
flashmodes: Auto Flash On Off Red-eye Reduction Second-curtain Sync Slow Sync Slow Sync./Red-eye Reduction
shootingmodes: Auto Fish-Eye Effect Landscape Miniature Effect Night Landscape Night Portrait Panorama Portrait Smooth Skin Snow
